title: Military Chain of Command Politicization Operations
description: Analysis of efforts to politicize military leadership, loyalty tests, and chain of command violations. Identified 240 pattern instances showing systematic attempts to impose political loyalty on military institutions.
research_questions: What are the specific mechanisms used for military politicization?
Who are the key actors coordinating military loyalty operations?
What timeline evidence exists for chain of command violations?
Which military leaders and positions are targeted for political control?
How do military politicization efforts connect to broader authoritarian strategies?
source_analysis: Trump Tyranny Tracker Batch 1 Analysis - 240 military politicization patterns identified across 45 articles
